user_request: Play the new Justin Bieber video on YouTube

The video is paused, showing the thumbnail for the music video "Honest" by Justin Bieber featuring Don Toliver, which has 26 million views. The interface also shows options for skipping the ad and other video controls.

click on the back button located at the top left.
click on the search icon located at the top right.
click on the Search bar located at the top middle of the screen.
type in the content: "new Justin Bieber video "
click on the search suggestion "new justin bieber video" located at middle and top part of the screen.
click on the video thumbnail for "Justin Bieber - Honest ft. Don Toliver" located at the lower middle part of screen
